20110126040339.000|20110126040342.000|CC1|MORE CONSEQUENTIAL THAN PARTY OR

20110126040342.000|20110126040346.000|CC1|WE ARE PART OF THE AMERICAN

20110126040346.000|20110126040348.000|CC1|WE BELIEVE THAT IN A COUNTRY

20110126040351.000|20110126040354.000|CC1|ARE STILL BOUND TOGETHER AS ONE

20110126040357.000|20110126040358.000|CC1|COMMON CREED, THAT THE DREAMS OF
20110126040358.000|20110126040400.000|CC1|A LITTLE GIRL IN TUCSON ARE NOT

20110126040545.000|20110126040548.000|CC1|FIX WHAT NEEDS FIXING AND MOVE

20110126040555.000|20110126040556.000|CC1|>> TODAY THERE ARE HUNDREDS OF  
20110126040556.000|20110126040557.000|CC1|THOUSANDS OF STUDENTS EXCELLING 
20110126040557.000|20110126040559.000|CC1|IN OUR SCHOOLS WHO ARE NOT

20110126040613.000|20110126040615.000|CC1|AND YET THEY LIVE EVERY DAY WITH
20110126040615.000|20110126040618.000|CC1|THE THREAT OF DEPORTATION.      
20110126040618.000|20110126040620.000|CC1|OTHERS COME HERE FROM ABROAD TO 
20110126040620.000|20110126040621.000|CC1|STUDY IN OUR COLLEGES AND       
20110126040621.000|20110126040623.000|CC1|UNIVERSITIES BUT AS SOON AS THEY

20110126040625.000|20110126040628.000|CC1|THEM BACK HOME TO COMPETE

20110126040629.000|20110126040631.000|CC1|IT MAKES NO SENSE.              
20110126040631.000|20110126040633.000|CC1|NOW I STRONGLY BELIEVE THAT WE  
20110126040633.000|20110126040634.000|CC1|SHOULD TAKE ON ONCE AND FOR ALL 
20110126040634.000|20110126040637.000|CC1|THE ISSUE OF ILLEGAL

20110126040640.000|20110126040642.000|CC1|PROTECT OUR BORDERS, ENFORCE OUR

20110126040643.000|20110126040645.000|CC1|OF UNDOCUMENTED WORKERS WHO ARE 
20110126040645.000|20110126040647.000|CC1|NOW LIVING IN THE SHADOWS.      
20110126040647.000|20110126040650.000|CC1|>> HOUSE BUDGET COMMITTEE CHAIR 
20110126040650.000|20110126040651.000|CC1|CONGRESSMAN PAUL RYAN OF        
20110126040651.000|20110126040653.000|CC1|WISCONSIN GAVE THE OFFICIAL

20110126040658.000|20110126040701.000|CC1|PRESIDENT FOR THE COUNTRY'S     
20110126040701.000|20110126040702.000|CC1|DEBT.                           
20110126040702.000|20110126040704.000|CC1|>> WHETHER SOLD AS STIMULUS OR  
20110126040704.000|20110126040706.000|CC1|REPACKAGED AS INVESTMENT THEIR  
20110126040706.000|20110126040707.000|CC1|ACTIONS SHOW THEY WANT A FEDERAL
20110126040707.000|20110126040708.000|CC1|GOVERNMENT THAT CONTROLS TOO

20110126040710.000|20110126040712.000|CC1|TOO MUCH IN ORDER TO DO TOO     
20110126040712.000|20110126040712.000|CC1|MUCH.                           
20110126040712.000|20110126040714.000|CC1|AND DURING THE LAST TWO YEARS,  
20110126040714.000|20110126040717.000|CC1|THAT IS EXACTLY WHAT WE HAVE    
20110126040717.000|20110126040717.000|CC1|GOTTEN.                         
20110126040717.000|20110126040719.000|CC1|ALONG WITH RECORD DEFICITS AND  
20110126040719.000|20110126040719.000|CC1|DEBT.                           
20110126040719.000|20110126040720.000|CC1|TO THE POINT WHERE THE PRESIDENT
20110126040720.000|20110126040722.000|CC1|IS NOW URGING CONGRESS TO       
20110126040722.000|20110126040725.000|CC1|INCREASE THE DEBT LIMIT.        
20110126040725.000|20110126040727.000|CC1|WE BELIEVE THE DAYS OF BUSINESS 
20110126040727.000|20110126040729.000|CC1|AS USUAL MUST COME TO AN END.   
20110126040729.000|20110126040732.000|CC1|WE HOLD TO A COUPLE SIMPLE      
20110126040732.000|20110126040732.000|CC1|CONVICTIONS.                    
20110126040732.000|20110126040735.000|CC1|ENDLESS BORROWING IS NOT A      
20110126040735.000|20110126040736.000|CC1|STRATEGY.                       
20110126040736.000|20110126040738.000|CC1|SPENDING CUTS HAVE TO COME FIRST
20110126040738.000|20110126040739.000|CC1|DEPENDING ON BUREAUCRACY TO     
20110126040739.000|20110126040741.000|CC1|FOSTER INNOVATION,              
20110126040741.000|20110126040742.000|CC1|COMPETITIVENESS, AND WISE       
20110126040742.000|20110126040745.000|CC1|CONSUMER CHOICES HAS NEVER      
20110126040745.000|20110126040745.000|CC1|WORKED.                         
20110126040745.000|20110126040747.000|CC1|IT WON'T WORK NOW.              
20110126040747.000|20110126040749.000|CC1|WE NEED TO CHART A NEW COURSE.  
20110126040749.000|20110126040752.000|CC1|>> AND THEN THERE WAS THE TEA   
20110126040752.000|20110126040753.000|CC1|PARTY'S RESPONSE FROM           
20110126040753.000|20110126040754.000|CC1|CONGRESSWOMAN MICHELE BACHMANN. 
20110126040754.000|20110126040756.000|CC1|SHE SEEMED TO MISS THE          
20110126040756.000|20110126040759.000|CC1|PRESIDENT'S POINT ON ENERGY.    
20110126040759.000|20110126040801.000|CC1|>> FOR TWO YEARS PRESIDENT OBAMA
20110126040801.000|20110126040802.000|CC1|MADE PROMISES JUST LIKE THE ONES
20110126040802.000|20110126040805.000|CC1|WE HEARD HIM MAKE THIS EVENING. 
20110126040805.000|20110126040807.000|CC1|YET, STILL, WE HAVE HIGH        
20110126040807.000|20110126040810.000|CC1|UNEMPLOYMENT, DEVALUED HOUSING  
20110126040810.000|20110126040811.000|CC1|PRICES, AND THE COST OF GASOLINE
20110126040811.000|20110126040813.000|CC1|IS SKYROCKETING.
